trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of data source names.
trans-unit.target: 建立可供使用者選取的資料來源名稱清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>類別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常所參考的物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data source names that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method are of components from the container of the specified context that are valid data sources.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源會傳回名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法都是有效的資料來源的元件從指定之內容的容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法會取得值，指出傳回的資料來源名稱可能值的獨占清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the data source names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法會取得值，指出資料來源名稱，一組標準可從清單中挑選的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法將指定的物件轉換為轉換器的原生類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method gets a value indicating whether this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法會取得值，指出是否此<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>可以將指定的來源類型中的物件轉換成原生類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method indicates whether the specified component implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法會指出指定的元件是否實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>類別時所參考類別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object for which conversion is being requested.
trans-unit.target: 所要求轉換的物件之 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個轉換器是否可以將所指定來源型別中的物件轉換成轉換器的原生型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is a string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="sourceType" /> 是字串則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method can only convert from a string, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> only returns `true` when `sourcetype` is a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>只能從字串轉換方法所以<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>只會傳回`true`時`sourcetype`是字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> does not use the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>不會使用`context`參數。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that specifies the culture of the <c>value</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，指定 <c>value</c> 參數的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數會以字串的型態傳回。

trans-unit.source: If the `value` parameter has a type of string, it is returned as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`參數具有字串型別，它會傳回為字串。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是`null`，空字串 ("") 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method does not use the `context` or `culture` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法未使用`context`或`culture`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is other than a string or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是字串以外的值，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the available data source names.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用資料來源名稱的清單。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> containing the names of the controls that implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> interface and are available for use in the given context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" />，包含實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 介面且可用於特定內容的控制項名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method creates a list of the names of the components that are valid data sources in the container of the object that is specified by the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法會建立一份是有效的資料來源所指定的物件容器中的元件名稱`context`參數。

trans-unit.source: It then converts that list to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 然後將轉換至該清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the returned data source names are an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示傳回的資料來源名稱是否為可能值的獨佔清單。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to return an exclusive list of data source names, also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method to return `true` when the data source name list is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>類別並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>也覆寫方法以傳回的資料來源名稱，獨占清單<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法以傳回`true`獨佔資料來源名稱清單時。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數不是由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 的物件，提供內容相關資訊給型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，讓型別轉換子執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of data source names that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個物件是否可以傳回從清單選取的標準資料來源名稱集合。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數不是由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示指定的元件是否為有效資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="component" /> is a valid data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="component" /> 是有效資料來源則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method considers the `component` parameter to be a valid data source if it implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法視為`component`參數是有效的資料來源，如果它實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method should be overridden by controls that need to further investigate a given component to decide whether it should be returned in the list of standard values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />應該覆寫方法，需要進一步調查到指定的元件，以決定是否應該傳回的標準值清單中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a control works with only <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> data sources, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> should return <see langword="true" /> only for those components that are <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項只搭配<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" />資料來源，<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />應該傳回<see langword="true" />僅針對那些元件<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" />物件。
